name: PlayCo-Sample 12: Space Candy
description:
A short single-player adventure game to collect candy in space, controlled by arrow keys and mouse.

Download the C3P-file to mod this game at:

https://playableconcepts.aalto.fi/portfolio/12-space-candy-game/

Download these CC-BY-3.0 Art Assets at: 

https://playableconcepts.aalto.fi/portfolio/pixel-style-basics/
